EmailTemplate.description: Invite tour attendees for next year in for earlier tour
EmailTemplate.name: Invite for earlier tour
EmailTemplate.subject: St Andrew's Cathedral School - Junior School tour
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName}
We have received your booked for our upcoming Head of School Tour. As you have indicated you are considering Junior School enrolment for next year would you like to come in for an earlier tour?
I am running a small Junior School tour on Tuesday 29 August at 9.00am - does that date suit you? If so, let me know and I will move your booking.
Regards
Robyn
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9552 mobile 0404 884 852 email RPedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
